version_description:
2.2.1
This update makes the app fully compatible with iPhone 6 and 6+!
It also contains fixes for a number of bugs.

2.1
This update will make the app compatible with iOS 8! We also have a few other changes for you:
- Added possibility to report private messages for our moderation team to look at
- The app's language will now match the language version you play on, instead of being determined by the phone.
- Minor improvements
- Bug fixes

2.2.2
This update makes the app fully compatible with iPhone 6 and 6+!
It also contains fixes for a number of bugs.

2.1
This update will make the app compatible with iOS 8! We also have a few other changes for you:
- Added possibility to report private messages for our moderation team to look at
- The app's language will now match the language version you play on, instead of being determined by the phone.
- Minor improvements
- Bug fixes

- Minor improvements
- Bug fixes

- Minor improvements
- Bug fixes

- Improved performance and responsiveness of app
- Improved compatibility with iOS 9
- Certain quests can now be skipped if you are an experienced player
- Squashed some bugs

This specific update contains:

* When forwarding reports or mails, easily pick contacts from your address book, friend list or tribe members.
* When recruiting units you can now preview the total costs.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements.
